value.original: Templates are used to convert server side components into client side representations, to javascript. Templates are called to process requests from the browser for user interface components. Templates can depend on eachother, a template can use functions/methods provided by another template. This is handled through template dependencies.

row.value: Templates are used to convert server side components into client side representations, to javascript. Templates are called to process requests from the browser for user interface components. Templates can depend on eachother, a template can use functions/methods provided by another template. This is handled through template dependencies.
